item.name: 1_testcase_for_super_user
item.description:
Steps to reproduse:
1. Login user (superuser_test)
2. Get list of the exist languages

Expected result:
Get list of the 50 languages

request.description:
Every request should have query parameter at URL access_key - by default use hash current BO authorization logic - Perl sessions.
We have possibility get access_key for user by application key. It's a new session logic on restful service. For this need use parameter &session_type=rest.
e.g.
Display the current list of languages
